name: The 2nd Global Conference on Research in Chemistry and Chemical Engineering
content: We are thrilled to invite you to the 2nd Global Conference on Research in Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, taking place from November 27 to 29, 2024, in Vienna, Austria. This prestigious event offers numerous benefits, including the opportunity to learn and network with scholars, students, and industryâ€™s leading experts such as chemical engineers, process and project engineers, university professors, chemists, lab scientists, R&D teams, and chemical project managers. The conference will provide publication opportunities for accepted and registered abstracts in the Conference Proceedings or various journals. The Conference Proceedings will be published with an ISBN Number in soft copy, and full papers submitted for publication will undergo a double-blind review process. Accepted papers will be published electronically with a DOI number. Papers considered for journal publication will also go through a double-blind peer-review process, ensuring high-quality research dissemination. Attendees will receive an invitation letter for attendance and a free city tour of Vienna, adding value to the overall conference experience. Please note the important dates: Paper Submission Deadline: 13 November 2024 Early Registration Deadline: 28 August 2024 Final Registration Deadline: 20 November 2024 We look forward to your participation in this exceptional event.
